<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 266 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
While you have your shield raised, you would take damage from a physical attack.

</column>

---

You snap your shield in place to ward off a blow. Your shield prevents you from taking an amount of damage up to the shield’s Hardness. You and the shield each take any remaining damage, possibly breaking or destroying the shield.

<title level="2">Shield Block leads to...</title>
[Aegis of Arnisant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1095), [Bastion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1895), [Fortify Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=2570), [Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882), [Quick Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=394), [Shield Warden](/Feats.aspx?ID=229)
name: Shield Block
